intro.title: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to VariableDeals
intro.description: VariableDeals is a web application designed to help businesses optimize product pricing across countries. By leveraging Purchasing Power Parity (PPP) and advanced discount strategies, VariableDeals ensures pricing is fair, accessible, and tailored to diverse economic conditions.
